entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
